request.description: Set the Service Status to Available
Enable Incident Management on this Service
Enable Incident Management on this Service

For Incident and Service request, sets:

- Stages and Checkpoints Dropdown
    
- All the visibility icons
Sets the Visibility of the service to portal facing
Sets the Connections settings on a Service to collaborative

body.raw:
<methodCall service="apps/com.hornbill.servicemanager/ServiceRequestDetails" method="addOrUpdateServiceRequestForm">
    <params>
        <serviceId>{{service_id}}</serviceId>
        <requestType>Incident</requestType>
        <serviceRequestForm><customize><fields><field id="requestImage" ><attributes visible="false"></attributes></field><field id="customFieldA" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="6" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Raising for yourself? (Yes/No)</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldB" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="7" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Affected User ID</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldC" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="8" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Summary Variable</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldD" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="9" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Approver Email</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldE" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="10" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Assign to Yourself (Yes/No)</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldF" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="11" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Impact</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldG" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="12" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Urgency (Yes/No)</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldH" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="13" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Other</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldI" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="14" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Priority</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldJ" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="15" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Category</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldK" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="16" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Request Item</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldL" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="17" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Initial Team</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldM" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="18" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Auto Task Display</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldO" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="19" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Approval ID</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldP" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="20" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Rejection Reason</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldQ" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="21" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Initial Team ID</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldR" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="22" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Application / Component</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldT" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="23" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Approval Type</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customField26" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="24" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>MI Auto Task Reference</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customField51" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="25" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>OOH Auto Task Reference</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customField52" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="26" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Security Incident Auto Task Reference</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customField53" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="27" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Security Incident Auto Task Reference2</en-GB></label></attributes></field></fields><sections/></customize></serviceRequestForm>
    </params>
</methodCall>

<methodCall service="apps/com.hornbill.servicemanager/ServiceRequestDetails" method="addOrUpdateServiceRequestForm">
	<params>
		<serviceId>{{service_id}}</serviceId>
		<requestType>Service Request</requestType>
		<serviceRequestForm><customize><fields><field id="requestImage" ><attributes visible="false"></attributes></field><field id="customFieldA" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="6" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Raising for yourself? (Yes/No)</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldB" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="7" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Affected User ID</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldC" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="8" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Summary Variable</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldD" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="9" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Approver Email</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldE" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="10" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Assign to Yourself (Yes/No)</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldF" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="11" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Impact</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldG" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="12" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Urgency (Yes/No)</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldH" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="13" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Other</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldI" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="14" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Priority</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldJ" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="15" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Category</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldK" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="16" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Rejection rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Rejection Reason</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldQ" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="19" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Initial Team ID</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customFieldR" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="20" rowNr="0"><attributes visible="false"  type="TextInput" required="true"  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Soft IMAC</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customField31" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="33" rowNr="0"><attributes  type="TextInput"  formItemStyle="added-field"><label><en-GB>Partner Cost</en-GB></label></attributes></field><field id="customField50" sectionId="requestDetailsInternal" columnIndex="0" rowIndex="34" rowNr="0"><attributes required="true"  type="ComboBox"  formItemStyle="added-field"  labelField="itemName" valueField="itemValue" 	</params>
</methodCall>

body.raw:
<methodCall service="apps/com.hornbill.servicemanager" method="translateCreate">
	<params>
		<entityObj>{"name":"ServiceFeedbackQuestions","title":"h_question","entityColumn":"h_id","linkedColumn":"h_question_id"}</entityObj>
		<inputTitle>Please rate your overall satisfaction on the service you have received: 10 (Outstanding) to 1 (Poor)</inputTitle>
		<inputDescription></inputDescription>
		<userLanguage>en-GB</userLanguage>
		<createEng>false</createEng>
		<extraParams>{"h_requesttype":"Incident","h_service_id":"{{service_id}}","h_field_required":true,"h_field_type":"multiOptions"}</extraParams>
	</params>
</methodCall>

body.raw:
<methodCall service="apps/com.hornbill.servicemanager/ServiceLevelAgreementService" method="smAddServiceLevelServiceEntry">
	<params>
		<serviceId>{{service_id}}</serviceId>
		<serviceName>Bob Service Blue</serviceName>
		<serviceLevelServiceId>[{"text":"Internal Support","h_id":"1","servicelevel_name":"Internal Support","servicelevel_description":"Service Level Agreement for defining all internal support terms agreed by IT with the business"}]</serviceLevelServiceId>
	</params>
</methodCall>

request.description: Add the Incident SLA to the Service

body.raw:
<methodCall service="apps/com.hornbill.servicemanager/ServiceLevelAgreementService" method="smAddServiceLevelServiceEntry">
    <params>
        <serviceId>{{service_id}}</serviceId>
        <serviceName>Bob Service Blue</serviceName>
        <serviceLevelServiceId>[{"text":"Bob SLA","h_id":"12","servicelevel_name":"Bob SLA","servicelevel_description":"Bob SLA"}]</serviceLevelServiceId>
    </params>
</methodCall>
